ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hardware
ygData.msgSnippet: For some reason I doubt it.  I believe he d probably still lag in the bazaar at certain points of the day.  I wonder how much RAM, how much video memory, how
ygData.messageBody:
For some reason I doubt it.  I believe he'd probably still lag in the bazaar at certain points of the day.  I wonder how much RAM, how much video memory, how fast a processor do you need before you DONT lag in the bazaar anymore?  3GB of RAM?  Over a 3Ghz processor?  I knoq pwoplw on DSL who still lag in the bazaar so I don't think that has anything to do with it. I'm on cable and I lag.
 
Wulfric
 
 

----- Original Message -----
From: Melanie Johnson
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, August 11, 2003 10:18 AM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Hardware


Oops, I stand corrected. heh.

--- STG2 Pierce <piercer@...> wrote:
> Heh heh not to brag or anything but I have no lag in

Bazaar..gotta love
